docs.title: 1. Architectural Decision Record (ADR): Region Selection logic
docs.text: The core of GreenOps is the Autonomous Migration Agent. This agent makes decisions based on three competing variables: Carbon Intensity ($), Spot Instance Pricing ($), and Network Latency ($).

docs.title: 3. The "Carbon Arbitrage" Mathematical Model
docs.text:
To meet NFR-02 (40% Cost Reduction), the system calculates the "Optimal Region" ({opt}$) using:

40201R_{opt} = \min \sum (C_i \cdot w_1 + P_s \cdot w_2 + L_n \cdot w_3)40201

Where $ represents the weights defined by the CIO's ESG policy.
